headline: Why The Narrative Around Blackbaud (BLKB) Is Resetting As Analysts Trim Price Targets
summary: Blackbaud is back in focus after several firms moved their price targets lower by about $20 to $25, prompting investors to reassess what they are willing to pay for the stock. These cuts come alongside more cautious analyst commentary on valuation and execution risk, even as some still see reasons to stay constructive on the long term story. Read on to see what is driving the reset and how you can track the next steps in this evolving narrative. Analyst Price Targets don't always capture the...
